turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I ordered a new coffee maker last week, and the tracking information hasn't updated in three days. It's just stuck on 'Shipping Label Created.' What's going on? I'm getting really frustrated.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. I can look into that for you. Can you please provide your order number so I can check the status?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's #2398745. Also, hypothetically, if the coffee maker *is* lost, what's your policy on replacements versus refunds? Just curious.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thanks! I've checked order #2398745. It appears there's a slight delay due to a backlog at the shipping facility. It should be scanned and on its way within 24-48 hours. I've escalated the tracking on your behalf. As for your question, in the rare event an item is lost in transit, we typically offer a replacement first, assuming the item is still in stock. If a replacement isn't possible or preferred, we'll issue a full refund. We'll keep an eye on your order, and I'll send you an update tomorrow morning.
